DOC.brief_summary: to determine safety, efficacy and tolerability of BI 1356 versus placebo
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy in Type 2 Diabetic Patients With Severe Chronic Renal Impairment, 5 mg BI 1356 (Linagliptin) vs. Placebo, Insulin Background Inclusive
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Male and female patients with type 2 diabetes and with glomerular filtration rate (GFR) <30 ml/min, who are not on chronic dialysis. Insufficient glycemic control (hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) between 7.0% and 10.0%) Age 18 or over and not older than 80 years Exclusion criteria: Treatment with any other anti diabetic drug other than insulin and/or sulphonylurea within 3 months prior to informed consent Myocardial infarction, stroke or transient ischemic attack (TIA) within 6 months prior to informed consent Unstable or acute congestive heart failure
